name: Hibachi Chicken
description: Teriyaki-glazed grilled chicken served alongside fried rice, noodles, and a medley of grilled zucchini and onions.

name: Hibachi Steak
description: Teriyaki-glazed flank steak, grilled to perfection, served with a trio of fried rice, noodles, and charred vegetables.

name: Hibachi Shrimp
description: Teriyaki-glazed grilled shrimp, paired with golden fried rice, silky noodles, and fire-roasted zucchini and onions.

name: Hibachi Salmon
description: Teriyaki-glazed grilled salmon fillet, served with aromatic fried rice, tender noodles, and a charred vegetable medley.
